description: A React component named ConnectJiraButton that renders a button to initiate the Jira OAuth authorization flow by requesting the authorization URL from the backend and redirecting the user to it. It manages loading state and handles errors during the fetch operation.

methods.name: ConnectJiraButton
methods.description: React functional component that renders a button to start Jira OAuth flow, manages loading state, and handles errors.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the button click event; fetches authorization URL and redirects, or calls onError on failure.
